name: Mondrian Simulator
description:
Game made for the Paint Game Jam 2020 (in only 2 days)

Mondrian Simulator is a really simple puzzle game: you just have to fill a square with a certain amount of blocks. However, everytime you start a new level the game generates a random combination of blocks, providing you a new challenge every time.

Features:

- A LOT of puzzle levels.

- The game first generates the solution and then the blocks, so all the puzzles you will face have a solution

- Two types of difficulties (Easy/Normal and Hard). However, keep in mind there's a chance to find a challenging level in Easy/Normal mode and an easy one in Hard mode.

- Relaxing sound effects (see the credits)

Credits:

Rain sound: https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/346641/

Other sounds: freesound.org

The game's name refers to the artist Piet Mondrian

Update 1 (07/04/2020):

- added an option at the start of the game to turn off the ambient sounds

- solved a bug that could cause the failure of the generation of the level in hard mode
